architectural_notes: Rituals container meditation tag icons should use assets: assets/mindfulness.png (mindfulness), assets/ifs.png (ifs), assets/meta.png (metta), assets/visualization.png (visualization).
Quiz completion should navigate via URL parameter to a single pre-meditation page, e.g., pre-meditation?type=visualization.

existing_features.title: In the rituals UI (saved rituals carousel within the rituals modal), replace the current meditation-type emoji icon with the same PNG icon assets used on the dashboard carousel for these tags: mindfulness -> assets/mindfulness.png, ifs -> assets/ifs.png, metta -> assets/meta.png, visualization -> /assets/visualization.png. Render the icon as an (or equivalent) next to the meditation type label, with appropriate alt text and sizing consistent with the existing tag pill layout.

Update the Dashboard Begin flow so that when the user selects the dashboard carousel item "Take Quiz" (meditation type id "quiz") and presses Begin, the app opens the existing 5-question recommendation quiz dialog instead of navigating directly to the pre-meditation page.

When the user completes the recommendation quiz from the dashboard, redirect them to the pre-meditation page with the recommended meditation type passed as a URL search parameter in the format /pre-meditation?type=<recommendedType> (e.g., /pre-meditation?type=visualization).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace meditation tag icons in rituals container with dashboard icon assets (mindfulness/ifs/metta/visualization).
Add 5-question meditation recommendation quiz when selecting Dashboard carousel 'Take quiz' and tapping Begin; redirect to pre-meditation page with recommended type as URL parameter.

projectName: Replace ritual tag icons with dashboard assets and launch recommendation quiz from Dashboard carousel
